general.comment: See documentation and support for One Step Checkout
general.label: General

rewrite_checkout_links.label: Activate OneStepCheckout
rewrite_checkout_links.comment:
Activates OneStepCheckout on your store by replacing the old links to the default Magento checkout.
PS: Please test OneStepCheckout before activating.

default_shipping_if_one.label: Select shipping method if only one available
default_shipping_if_one.comment: If your default shipping method is not available when quote is created and only one method is available at the time this will be selected as default (works only when default you have chosen default shipping method)

hide_shipping_method.label: Hide shipping method
hide_shipping_method.comment: Hide (default) shipping method if there is only one available. Do not use in combination with shipping methods like UPS, Fedex etc that require postcode or similar before calculating the rates.

hide_payment_method.label: Hide payment method
hide_payment_method.comment: Hide (default) payment method if there is only one available. Do not use in combination with payment methods which depend on address data, shipping method or cart rule.

enable_different_shipping_hide.label: Hide different shipping address
enable_different_shipping_hide.comment: By default the shipping address form is displayed as "open". If you need to hide it then you can set this field to "yes"

enable_geoip.label: Enable GeoIP
enable_geoip.comment: If enabled then this will override default country, region, city and postcode settings, note that you need to enable Net/GeoIP pear package on your server and upload GeoIP database to server

geoip_database.label: GeoIP database
geoip_database.comment: relative (from amgento root) or absolute path to GeoIp (city and country databases are supported) database on your server

hide_nonfree_payment_methods.label: Hide non-free payment methods for zero value order

show_custom_options.label: Show product options
show_custom_options.comment: Show product options for configurable products.

exclude_fields.comment: Here you can make changes to which fields the user is presented with in OneStepCheckout.
exclude_fields.label: Exclude/include fields

enable_comments_default.label: Merge comments to default order comment collection

enable_address_fields.label: Separate address fields
enable_address_fields.comment: Adds labels to every address field so you can mimic "House number" or any other field separation

sortordering_fields.comment: Here you can make changes to in which order the fields are presented in OneStepCheckout.
sortordering_fields.label: Display order of fields

feedback.label: How did you hear about us?

enable_feedback_freetext.label: Enable "Other ..." field
enable_feedback_freetext.comment: If enabled users can type free text and "Other ..." value will be added to dropdown

feedback_values.label: Values
feedback_values.comment: Values entered here will appear as labels in feedback dropdown on checkout page

registration.comment: Different setups for requiring registration/login. Please see user manual for further details.
registration.label: Registration

extra_products.label: Extra products (Gift wrap, Rush delivery, etc)
extra_products.comment:
You can show extra products in the checkout which the customer can choose before placing the order.
Common usage for this feature is "Gift wrap" (with extra fee), "Rush delivery" and similar offers. This feature will simply show extra products below the order summary and allow the customer to add them to their cart.

product_ids.label: Product ID's
product_ids.comment:
Enter product IDs to product you want to display and separate with comma for multiple.
Example: 2,4

direct_checkout.label: Redirect clients to checkout after adding a product to the cart
direct_checkout.comment: Changes the behaviour of "add to cart" button by redirecting all or some clients directly to checkout

group_ids.label: Group ID's
group_ids.comment:
Enter cusomergroup IDs who you want to exclude from direct redirect and separate with comma (no spaces) for multiple.
Example: 2,4
Guests belong to group 0 , if field is left blank all clients will be redirected

redirect_to_cart.label: Skip cart on/off
redirect_to_cart.comment: You can skip cart and make "add to cart" button add item to cart and redirect to checkout after product is successfully added to cart.

ajax_update.label: AJAX update shipping/payment methods

enable_update_payment_on_shipping.label: Update payment methods when chosen shipping method

terms.comment: OneStepCheckout Terms configuration settings are rearranged, please enter Magento default Terms and Conditions from Sales > Terms and Conditions and enable them on checkout from System > Configuration > Sales > Checkout.
terms.label: Terms and conditions

enable_default_terms.label: Show Magento Checkout Terms and Conditions
enable_default_terms.comment: Instead of OSC agreement textbox you can use default magento agreement feature. You'll find this under Sales > Terms and Conditions tab

addressreview.label: Live preview of addresses entered in review block

enable_addressreview.label: Enable Live address display on review block
